title: The Beatles Break Up
description: The Beatles, one of the most influential bands in history, officially disbanded in 1970, marking the end of an era in music.

title: CNN is Founded
description: Ted Turner launches the Cable News Network (CNN), the first 24-hour all-news television channel, revolutionizing how news is consumed.

title: Hubble Space Telescope is Launched
description: NASA launches the Hubble Space Telescope, providing humanity with breathtaking images and groundbreaking discoveries about the universe.

title: International Space Station is Inhabited
description: The first crew of astronauts arrives at the International Space Station (ISS), beginning a continuous human presence in space.

title: The Arab Spring Begins
description: A series of pro-democracy uprisings and protests spread across the Middle East and North Africa, leading to significant political changes.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic
description: The World Health Organization declares the novel coronavirus outbreak a global pandemic, leading to widespread lockdowns and societal changes.

title: First Images from James Webb Telescope
description: The James Webb Space Telescope releases its first full-color images, offering unprecedented views of the early universe.

title: Artemis III Mission
description: NASA's Artemis III mission is scheduled to land the first woman and the next man on the Moon, marking a new chapter in lunar exploration.
